explanation: [0-0] A man in a Minecraft costume is standing in front of a staircase, holding a phone in his left hand and tapping the screen with his right hand. In the distant background, four plush toys are placed in a row on the stairs, with green and blue lights in the background.

[0-4] Immediately afterwards, the man swipes the phone screen and looks surprised. Then the scene switches to a brown sofa with a black cushion and a tablet with a human avatar on it. A right hand holding a phone is lifted from below, showing a Tiktok video. The video features a woman pouting at the camera, then backing away to reveal her broad shoulders. The man opens his mouth, his eyes bulge, and his expression is shocked. The camera then cuts to the phone, showing the current number of likes for the video at 15.3M. When the picture cuts back to the man, he is startled, the phone falls into his arms, his mouth wide open, and he runs to the right.
